root.name: Neo Super Robot Wars
root.description: Featured SeriesA list of the anime series which are featured in the game.Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with "(new)".Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mobile Suit Victory Gundam Mobile Fighter G Gundam New Mobile Report Gundam Wing (new) Mazinger Z Shin Getter Robo (manga version of both mecha and characters) Brave Raideen Demon Sky Dragon Gaiking (new) Super Electomagnetic Machine Voltes V (new) Invincible Robo Trider G7 (new) Super Beast Machine God Dancougar Blue Comet SPT Layzner (new) Banpresto Originals (Original characters created for the game) SRX (Banpresto Original storyline; new)
